markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Blackfrost Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2497)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Most creatures who perish from the cold while cursed with blackfrost rise as zombies. Though mindless, blackfrost zombies are driven by the invisible will of blackfrost to spread their foul curse.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Blackfrost_Zombie.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Blackfrost Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2497)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 120
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 5

**Opportune Bite** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature critically fails a Strike within 10 feet of the blackfrost zombie; **Effect** The blackfrost zombie Steps toward the triggering creature, then makes a jaws Strike against that creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet; ice climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +15,
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +15,
**Damage** 2d4+5 piercing plus 1d6 cold and [blackfrost](/Curses.aspx?ID=51)

**Blackfrost Breath** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The blackfrost dead gasps sharply, then exhales a mist of dark-blue blackfrost particles in a 5-foot emanation. All creatures within the mist become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. The mist persists for 1 minute. A creature that ends its turn in the mist is exposed to [blackfrost](/Curses.aspx?ID=51). The blackfrost dead can't use Blackfrost Breath again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-333" />
name: Blackfrost Zombie
